name: pollinations-ipfs
description: pollinations ipfs state, messaging and storage

scripts.build_backend: mkdir -p dist && esbuild src/backend/pollinate-cli.js --platform=node --target=node14 --bundle --external:fsevents --external:electron > dist/pollinate.js  && esbuild src/backend/social-post-cli.js --platform=node --target=node14 --bundle --external:fsevents --external:electron > dist/social-post.js && esbuild src/backend/pinning-cli.js --platform=node --target=node14 --bundle --external:fsevents --external:electron > dist/pin.js&& esbuild src/backend/discord-post-cli.js --platform=node --target=node14 --bundle --external:fsevents --external:electron > dist/discord-post.js && chmod ugoa+x dist/*.js
scripts.install_backend: cp -v dist/pollinate.js /usr/local/bin/pollinate && cp -v dist/social-post.js /usr/local/bin/social_post.js && cp -v dist/pin.js /usr/local/bin/pin.js && cp -v dist/discord-post.js /usr/local/bin/discord-post.js && cp -v scripts/*.sh /usr/local/bin

author: Thomas Haferlach
